PLO1.title: Knowledge and Understanding
PLO1.refers_to: Foundational and advanced knowledge of the discipline, including the ability to recall and recognise key concepts while anticipating implications for future professional practice.
PLO1.short_desc: Disciplinary knowledge with awareness of future implications.

PLO2.title: Cognitive and Analytical Skills
PLO2.refers_to: Ability to analyse complex problems by integrating knowledge, evidence, and anticipatory thinking to support ethical and sustainable decision-making.
PLO2.short_desc: Analytical and problem-solving skills for complex and future-oriented issues.

PLO3.title: Practical and Technical Skills
PLO3.refers_to: Ability to perform and adapt professional or technical procedures strategically in response to changing contexts and practice requirements.
PLO3.short_desc: Strategic application and adaptation of practical skills.

PLO4.title: Interpersonal and Teamwork Skills
PLO4.refers_to: Ability to interact, collaborate, and respond effectively within teams by demonstrating integrity and shared professional responsibility.

PLO5.title: Ethical Values and Professional Conduct
PLO5.refers_to: Commitment to ethical norms, etiquette, and responsible professional behaviour in decision-making and practice.

PLO6.title: Systems and Sustainability Awareness
PLO6.refers_to: Ability to understand and organise actions by considering interconnected systems and long-term sustainability implications.

PLO7.title: Applied Problem Response
PLO7.refers_to: Ability to respond appropriately to complex professional situations by applying integrated problem-solving skills guided by ethical considerations.
PLO7.short_desc: Responsible response to complex professional challenges.

PLO8.title: Leadership and Responsibility
PLO8.refers_to: Ability to demonstrate leadership, professionalism, and responsibility when working with others in professional and organisational contexts.

PLO9.title: Personal and Professional Well-being
PLO9.refers_to: Ability to reflect on personal values, well-being, and professional roles to support lifelong learning and responsible practice.

PLO10.title: Entrepreneurship and Innovation
PLO10.refers_to: Ability to identify opportunities, apply innovative thinking, and create value responsibly with honesty and integrity.

PLO11.title: Ethics and Professional Accountability
PLO11.refers_to: Consistent demonstration of ethical awareness, professional conduct, and accountability in all academic and professional activities.
